solution_line_template: The total amount of money used to charge the debit card is {debit_card_fraction}*${total_pay} = ${debit_card_recharge}<<{debit_card_fraction}*{total_pay}={debit_card_recharge}>>{debit_card_recharge}.
When he buys the used car, he still has ${debit_card_recharge} - ${car_cost} = ${remaining_money}<<{debit_card_recharge}-{car_cost}={remaining_money}>>{remaining_money} left.
